mapper.insert:

(#{user.name},#{user.tel},#{user.address})
mapper.select: select O.ID as order_id, U.NAME as user_name, U.ID as user_id, G.NAME as goods_name, G.PRICE as goods_price, G.ID as goods_id, (O.GOODS_PRICE * O.GOODS_NUM) as totalPrice from "ORDER" as O join USER U on U.ID = O.USER_ID join GOODS G on G.ID = O.GOODS_ID where G.NAME is not null and U.NAME is not null
